channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why The Russian Earthquake Caused A Weaker Tsunami Plus 4 Other Facts
item.description: 5 things you need to know about tsunamis, including why the recent one associated with the Russian earthquake was relatively weak.

item.title: Nintendo Is Raising Switch Prices, Says Switch 2 May Be Next

item.title: ‘Starfield’ And A New Expansion Heading To PS5 In 2026, Says Report
item.description: While once upon a time, Xbox seemed determined to keep a new first party IP like Starfield to itself, things change. A lot.
